text: The NES Advantage is a arcade style controller manufactured by Asciiware and released by Nintendo for the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1987.Nintendo Power: "Also from Asciiware, who actually made the NES Advantage that Nintendo of America then licensed from them, comes the Super Advantage." Nintendo Power. Nintendo of America. June 1993, page 60. The stick features two turbo buttons. It is very large, and takes up both controller ports on the system. ==Related pages== *Nintendo Entertainment System *Super Advantage *NES Max ==References== Category:Joysticks Category:Nintendo
title: NES Advantage
